CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Won Radio - Mrs. W. B. Moore, 2241 Wylie Avenue was pleased when told by Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin, Courier vice president, that she had won the beautiful Crosley Kitchen Radio, one of which has been given at each of the fairs by Crosley Division, Avco Manufacturing Corporation."
TitMainTitle: Daisy Lampkin presents Mrs. W. B. Moore with a prize radio, standing in front of demonstration kitchen with Crosley Appliances on stage in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
